proper noun.description: A US family of artists, notably N. C. (1882–1944), full name Newell Convers Wyeth, whose many illustrations appeared in publications; his son Andrew Newell (1917–2009), whose paintings include Christina's World (1948) and the Helga series (1971–85); and Andrew's son Jamie (born 1946), full name James Browning Wyeth, whose notable paintings include Portrait of J.F.K. (1965), Wolfbane (1984), and his series of portraits of Orca Bates.
